sentences.sContent: Jonah and his youngest son were, on the surface at least, reconciled.
sentences.sCn: 乔纳和他小儿子和好了，至少表面上如此。

synos.tran: 使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + concile(看做council， 委员会) → 一再召开委员会 → 使协调； 使和解

words.tran: 不矛盾的；可和解的；可调和的

trans.tranCn: 使协调； 使和解； 使顺从
trans.tranOther: to have a good relationship again with someone after you have quarrelled with them
